PageTitle: advertise-community-gshut(BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view/BGP-IPv6 unicast address family view)
FuncDef:
The advertise-community-gshut command advertises the g-shut community attribute of the address family level.
The undo advertise-community-gshut command deletes the g-shut community attribute of an address family. The advertise-community-gshut command advertises the g-shut community attribute of the address family level. The undo advertise-community-gshut command deletes the g-shut community attribute of an address family. By default, a device is disabled from advertising the g-shut community attribute.
ParentView: BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view,BGP-IPv6 unicast address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Advertises routes with the g-shut community attribute to all IBGP peers.
-

Advertises routes with the g-shut community attribute to all EBGP peers.
-
